column3: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Refused (Col. 3)
column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False/ Mistake of Law Etc. (Col. 4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col. 5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Chargesheets were Laid (Col. 6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Total [Col. 4+5+6] (Col. 7)

column2: Other LSL Crimes not Including Above
